main event: An unconventional aircraft was observed near Redstone Arsenal, Alabama on July 15, 1950.
interesting points: The object was flying at approximately 1,000 feet elevation with an air speed of 100-125 miles per hour., The object was described as circular and constructed of shiny polished material that reflected sunlight., Witnesses noted the aircraft experienced flight trouble, with its triangular sections moving in opposite directions., The sighting occurred under overcast weather with a slight thunderstorm behind the object., The object made a sharp 75 to 90 degree turn and accelerated out of view in less than 5 seconds.
witness description: employees of the Chief Signal Office and the Ordnance Rocket Center
